name: AWS S3 WebTx
description: This plugin is used to deliver web transactions data to AWS S3 platform. To access the plugin, you would need the credentials of AWS S3 instance.

configuration.label: Authentication Method
configuration.description: Select the method to be used for AWS client authentication.

configuration.label: Private Key
configuration.description: Private Key for decrypting the AWS Private CA Certificate. Required for 'AWS IAM Roles Anywhere' authentication type.

configuration.label: Certificate Body
configuration.description: Certificate Body for AWS Public/Private CA Certificate. Required for 'AWS IAM Roles Anywhere' authentication type.

configuration.label: Password Phrase
configuration.description: Password Phrase for decrypting the CA Certificate. Required for 'AWS IAM Roles Anywhere' authentication type.

configuration.label: Profile ARN
configuration.description: AWS Profile ARN for AWS client authentication. Required for 'AWS IAM Roles Anywhere' authentication type.

configuration.label: Role ARN
configuration.description: AWS Role ARN for AWS client authentication. Required for 'AWS IAM Roles Anywhere' authentication type.

configuration.label: Trust Anchor ARN
configuration.description: AWS Trust Anchor ARN for AWS client authentication. Required for 'AWS IAM Roles Anywhere' authentication type.

configuration.label: AWS S3 Bucket Region Name
configuration.description: AWS S3 Bucket Region Name from where to get the AWS S3 Bucket. Make sure that the region name matches the region in the Profile ARN and Trust Anchor ARN.

configuration.label: AWS S3 Bucket Name
configuration.description: AWS S3 Bucket Name in which the data object will be stored.

configuration.label: Maximum File Size (in MBs)
configuration.description: Maximum size of WebTx data object to be stored in the bucket. (Value should be between 1 to 100.)

configuration.label: Maximum Duration (in Seconds)
configuration.description: Maximum duration after which the WebTx data object should be stored in the bucket.
